data.text: For you will spread out to the right and left;
Do not be afraid, for you will not be put to shame;
For your husband is your Maker—
For the LORD has called you back,
“For a brief moment I forsook you,
“For to Me this is like the days of Noah,54:9 Some manuscripts For this is like the waters of Noah
Though the mountains may be removed
I will make your pinnacles of rubies,
Then all your sons will be taught by the LORD,54:13 Cited in John 6:45
In righteousness you will be established,
If anyone attacks you, it is not from Me;
Behold, I have created the craftsman
No weapon formed against you shall prosper,
